Buttons.Exit.Tip: Exit - if something changed, you will be asked to save

Note.ItemNotSaved: To add a note, please save item first

PublishStatus.Label: Status:
PublishStatus.hide.Tip: This item is not publicly visible
PublishStatus.branch.Tip: Changes are only visible to editors

Dialog.Title: Save Mode
Dialog.Intro: This determines how you will save. The default is show/publish.

Show.Title: Show / Publish Everything
Show.Body: Show changes to the public after you save.

Hide.Title: Hide Everything
Hide.Body: This item will be hidden and only visible to content editors.

Branch.Title: Draft / Hide Changes
Branch.Body: Only editors can see changes until published at a later time.

Message.DeleteError: Delete failed. Please check console for more information
Message.SwitchedLanguageToDefault: We have switched language to default {{language}} because it's missing some or all values
Message.CantSwitchLanguage: Can't switch languages until current language has all required values
Message.NoDataBundles: No Entity or Content for data bundles found. Select some Entity or Content on MetaData Export Decorator.

LangMenu.MissingDefaultLangValue: please create value in the default language {{languages}} before translating

SnackBar.Title: ⚠️ Warning: You are using a test account
SnackBar.Body:
You are using a demo Google Account to translate. This can stop working at any time.
You must register your own API key. It's free for 500'000 words per month. See docs.

LangMenu.NoTranslatableFieldsFound: No fields found which can be translated/unlocked.
LangMenu.NoAutoTranslatableFieldsFound: No fields found which can be auto-translated.

Dialog.Title: Translate {{name}}
Dialog.Intro: You can do many things when translating, like linking languages together.

FromPrimary.Title: Translate from: {{primary}}
FromPrimary.Body: Begin translation with with the value in the primary language

FromOther.Title: Translate from: ...
FromOther.Body: Begin translation with the value from another language
FromOther.Subtitle: Language to translate from

LinkShared.Title: Share with another language (read/write)
LinkShared.Body: Link languages together to use the same editable value
LinkShared.Subtitle: Language to share with

Dialog.PickLanguageIntro: Only languages with content can be selected.

AutoTranslateAll.Title: Auto-Translate all Fields using Google Translate
AutoTranslateAll.Body: Only fields that are not yet translated will be auto-translated. Note that not all fields will be translated - see docs.

Dialog.NoAutoTranslatableFields: There are no auto-translatable fields in this form

Errors.SaveErrors: To save the form, please fix the following errors:
Errors.FormulaConfiguration: There is an error in form configuration. Please report this to admin
Errors.FormulaCalculation: There was an error in form calculations. Please report this to admin

General.CopyHint: This is a copy and will be saved as a new item

ItemCard.SlotUsedTrue: This item is open for editing. Click here to lock / remove it and revert to default.
ItemCard.SlotUsedFalse: This item is locked and will stay empty/default. The values are shown for your convenience. Click here to unlock if needed.

ValidationMessage.Min: This value should be {{Min}} or higher
ValidationMessage.Max: This value should be {{Max}} or lower
ValidationMessage.MinNoItems: Number of items should be {{AllowMultiMin}} or higher
ValidationMessage.MaxNoItems: Number of items should be {{AllowMultiMax}} or lower
ValidationMessage.Decimals: This number can have up to {{Decimals}} decimal places

Picker.QueryError: Error: An error occurred while executing the query. {{error}} See the console for more information.
Picker.QueryErrorNoData: Error: An error occurred while executing the query. No data found. See the console for more information.
Picker.QueryStreamNotFound: Error: The query did not return a stream named
Picker.QueryNotDefined: Error: can't load data, query is not configured
